name: Love Is Blind (Press Pause)
description:
Try and find your way out of this maze, where your only sense of direction is the sound of your lovers voice. 

Movement-WASD/Arrow Keys(movement is relative to your facing direction)

Mouse-Turn/Navagate Menus

Programming and game design-Press Pause

Music-Hayden Juneau(https://haycj.bandcamp.com/)
